body_html:
There is some weirdness going on with the generated Caffe2 CMake files when cuDNN is found.

00:06:47.364 CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:55 (add_library):
00:06:47.364   Target "c10d" links to target "caffe2::cudnn" but the target was not found.
00:06:47.364   Perhaps a find_package() call is missing for an IMPORTED target, or an
00:06:47.364   ALIAS target is missing?
body_text:
There is some weirdness going on with the generated Caffe2 CMake files when cuDNN is found.
00:06:47.364 CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:55 (add_library):
00:06:47.364   Target "c10d" links to target "caffe2::cudnn" but the target was not found.
00:06:47.364   Perhaps a find_package() call is missing for an IMPORTED target, or an
00:06:47.364   ALIAS target is missing?
body:
There is some weirdness going on with the generated Caffe2 CMake files when cuDNN is found.

```
00:06:47.364 CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:55 (add_library):
00:06:47.364   Target "c10d" links to target "caffe2::cudnn" but the target was not found.
00:06:47.364   Perhaps a find_package() call is missing for an IMPORTED target, or an
00:06:47.364   ALIAS target is missing?
```
